documents.document: A lot of reflective moments in season 5 of Citizen Khan @adilray. I hope that doesn’t mean it’s the last season…
@mixfm_request dave and the dynamos life begins at forty
@mixfm_request Halestorm all i wanna do
@mixfm_request Red Red Wine UB40 Extended
@freedlander @five15design The hair is, yes.
@adilray What is wrong with people?
@mixfm_request Halestorm All I Wanna Do Is Make Love To You
And I’d like to think Trump’s stance against abortion isn’t just a religious thing, but that killing another human is immoral regardless.
Finally the USA has a president who actually has the guts to stand up against abortion - something other leaders have been too weak to do.
@mixfm_request Creedence Clearwater Revival Hello Mary Lou
I guess we’re seeing the difference between left fascists (protesters) and the “normal” left (the majority leftists who are not protesting).
As someone left-of-centre I’m actually embarrassed by what the left are doing in respect to Trump’s election.
I’m very confused. Those protesting against Trump want democracy, but only when it suits them, right?
@mixfm_request Matchbox 20 She’s so mean
@mixfm_request Chills Heavenly Pop Hit
@mixfm_request Huey Lewis and the News Power Of Love
@metservice We know when we get above 120 km/hr because the hatch to access the roof space gets blown down and makes a mess on the floor!
@mixfm_request The Cars You’re Just What I Needed
Why would you bring an electric prod to a rodeo if you don’t intend to use it? Just saying. https://t.co/gLpRlUmBAm

@mixfm_request Simon Can’t Stand Losing
Another correct answer would be son-in-law. https://t.co/j8kDNMnFOe
Trump may well be the key to avoiding another cold war between USA and Russia. It’s one area he may well succeed where others have failed.
First the KKK, now we have this: https://t.co/jXiYgM4pOf
Was talking quite excitedly at Wellington Airport about the weather bomb. I then realised I’d said the word “bomb” half a dozen times.
I’m thinking the weather bomb has bypassed Wellington.
@metservice Thank you!
I wouldn’t go as far as Bob Jones’ comments, but where he IS right is that they’re an eyesore and begging should be made illegal.
Hi @metservice, any indications what time wind gusts in Wellington are expected to be at their peak?
@samcunnane @gwr Yeah I know! Fair to say, it can’t stand up on its own and needs to be tethered. But still, it’s crazy!
@samcunnane Those things can really grow. The @GWR for the height of a sunflower is... wait for it… over 9m!
I was really surprised to learn that @AnnWilson hated the song “All I Wanna Do Is Make Love To You”. Like many New Zealanders I love it!
@paolabrett 22 years and I’ve never heard of it!
Enjoying music from Lzzy Hale from @Halestorm
Lzzy Hale rocks! I have a friend she reminds me of. @Halestorm
What planet R @trademe on? “not commonly used in New Zealand eg PayPal” https://t.co/hoGIkL1rnQ Many NZ online businesses only use PayPal.
@axmcc @publicaddress Any good on the barbie?
Well, that was #BlackFriday done and dusted. Any bad luck happen to anyone?
Just realised it’s Black Friday today - take care out there! #BlackFriday
Lake Taupo, Stewart Island, and the Chatham Islands all have a similar shape.
@five15design @kathmandugear LOL my el-cheapo Warehouse one is still going 14 years on!
@guywilliamsguy Not the “coffee” thing again… :)
@simiananderson @benross_akl Sure. So instead of electricity -> fuel cell -> train, why not just electricity -> train?!!!
@simiananderson Yeah my point was that electricity is generally not anywhere near 100% renewable. NZ = 60%.
@jamespeshaw @cupoteacoast Not so fast… how do they get the hydrogen? That would almost certainly have involved emissions.
@greenpeacenz Thanks!
Hey @greenpeacenz, your ad invites people to sign the petition against river pollution but I can’t find it on your website!
@treskewl1 @missgracenz It’s hard not to judge when someone tells you they bought chocolate hot cross buns! 🤢
Doing requests on @mixfm. Tweet if you’d like a song! Listen live: https://t.co/0Et4OiyKZq
@dacidbro @cupoteacoast Pineapple on pizzas is for people who don’t know what pizzas are. #PineappleDoesntGoOnPizza
A fantastic video on the way millennials are, their psyche, and how they are different from the rest of society: https://t.co/6VOJrXEa0M

@purelyspace Yep, just as I tweeted. M5.5.
Sizeable jolt in #Wellington! #eqnz
@purelyspace It only has old content. Called customer service and they told me they’d just added Zootopia. We’d watched that months ago!
Signed up with @netflix today. BIG DISAPPOINTMENT. Annie, BFG, Secret Life/Pets, Dressmaker, Finding D: none available. All there on iTunes.
What is the “S” that everyone drew in the 80s and 90s? The answer is here! https://t.co/gqvEWAf7lW https://t.co/3hlcbrzaJC
It used to be that @nzme had the best radio stations, but now I’d say it would have to be @mediaworksnz with @thesoundnz and @morefmradio.
How about a tricycle for Christmas? Good condition. $20 and it’s yours. Collect from Wellington northern suburbs. https://t.co/jN5bDwb1qu
I assume (hope!) that Kelly meant to say that female vet grads spend 2/5 of the number of years that male grads do in their profession.
Sounds like Chris Kelly used the wrong words and what he said ended up having a completely different meaning. https://t.co/6JCzpkEgWA
@guywilliamsguy No they don’t. The put them there because the competition are doing the same :)
